Title: Enacts the "SAFETY (Stand Against Flags of Enemy Terrorists) Act"
Summary: Expands the offense of aggravated harassment in the first degree to include etching, painting, drawing upon or otherwise placing or displaying emblems, logos, flags or other symbols of designated terrorist organizations on any building or other real property without express permission of the owner or operator of such building or real property.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to enacting the "SAFETY (Stand Against Flags of Enemy Terrorists) act"
